title: NFL ATL: Week 12 preview, TNF recap
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Week 12 preview, TNF recap
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus and Marc Sessler give you the full Week 12 preview and break down the top games to watch. The crew also recaps the action from NFL Network’s “Thursday Night Football” matchup between the New Orleans Saints and Atlanta Falcons. Don’t miss the gang’s hero picks this week. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
